name: EXON
description:
The life of the little girl, whose hands were cold, lived in the village. Now he cannot do anything and asks for help from the villagers. Recently, apocalypse is beginning to emerge. Then the girl should do her best to prepare for it! Brave the girl!

The name of the game came out: it was like 2 at night. My friend barely woke up. When he came out, he came into my room and said, "EXON."

We would normally take the game out early but we panicked because of CODIV-19. We suspended the game, but we were able to finish the game anyway.
